metadata.name: OG T-Shirt
metadata.description: This is the second limited edition redeemable Mover drop. The T-shirt is hand-crafted from the finest fabric the CEO could find. On the inside, it contains a QR with a hash linked to this NFT to prove authenticity and exclusivity. On the outside, the art is so realistic, with the colors so vivid you can almost feel them. Hence, there are only 42 OG T-Shirts ever to be produced.
